name: Vondel View B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We've stayed at many B&B's and have to say that Vondel View is one of the best anywhere. We arranged a car through Rita (thanks Rob!) and arrived at around 10:30. Rita let us drop our bags, made sure we knew how to get back and we were off! We had previously stayed near Vondel Park so were familiar with the area and were pleased to confirm the convenience for visiting Amsterdam.
reviews.title: Amazing, Incredible, Marvelous. . .

reviews.text: We realized the next morning to make sure we woke up hungry! Rita sets up an amazing breakfast: eggs (soft boiled or omelet), meat, cheese, pastry, bread, jams, juice, fresh fruits, coffee, tea. . . wow!
reviews.title: perfect place to stay in Amsterdam

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in the Suite. Very nice and comfortable retreat at the end of the day. Great bed, beautiful new bathroom, free wireless internet access.
reviews.title: True relaxation while experincing the buzz of Amsterdam

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Most importantly, we wanted to make a comment about Rita herself. She is wonderful. She was helpful when we were planning out visit to Keukenhof and other locations, made sure we were having a good visit and wasn't intrusive. My wife left her iPod when we departed and Rita posted it to us at our next destination. We were very happy to make her acquaintance and hope to visit again.
reviews.title: A hidden gem with a great host

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!
reviews.title: 22-26 avril 2012

reviews.text: My partner and I were with 2 friends in the Vondel view.
reviews.title: comfortable, stylish and very lovely decorated apartment

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Rita was very very friendly.
reviews.title: What a wonderful place to stay

reviews.text: She took care of everything.
reviews.title: Big, clean, quiet room, excellent breakfasts, 2 minute walk to Tram 1

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: And she has tried to make our vacation time as comfortable as possible.
reviews.title: So happy to find this B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The B & B is beautiful and very well situated. It's close ti theTram and Vondel Park. Rita was an excellent hostess. Breakfast was WONDERFUL! Our room was beautiful and very comfortable.
reviews.title: Vondel View - Lovely

reviews.text: We enjoyed our stay in Vondel View. Rita gave as a warm welcome, the apartment is spacious and tastefully arranged. We also enjoyed a gourmet breakfast, the good neighborhood and nearby Vondel Park. Sometimes her friendly, orange he-cat gave us a visit, which really was a big extra-bonus. Christian & Ingrid & Patrick
reviews.title: Friendly, Beautiful, Good Located

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: What a treat! Rita the cheerful proprietor of the Vondel View Bed and Breakfast will lend you her limitless insights, advice on what to do during your visit and an umbrella too. The Vondel View B&B is immaculate and furnished in contemporary style furnishings blended perfectly with traditional touches of old world Dutch hospitality and grace. Rita will arrange your transportation to and from the airport and see you off with a smile every day. Her breakfasts are fabulously prepared and cheerfully delivered each morning (sometimes accompanied by Jongen her equally friendly cat) to your room. Vondel View B&B is located on a quiet side street within quick reach of the tram line, restaurants and shops on Overtoom in one direction and the grand Vondel Park the other. Either way you turn from 14 Gerard Brandstraat you are a short walk from Van Gogh, Rembrandt, and classic canal architecture of old Amsterdam. We must admit however, all of this would have been lost to us when searching in cyber space for accommodations in a distant country had it not been for Rita’s reassuring, kind, and thoughtful correspondence. It left us with no doubt, and now with the experience, that Vondel View B&B is the best B&B in the Netherlands period. Ray and Paula Reuter
reviews.title: What a Treat!
Wonderful B&B
reviews.text: For myself, wife, and a 7 year old son, this was the best accommodation that we had during our small Europe tour including London, Paris, and Brussels. My son said it the best that Ms. Rita's house was better than any of the other 5 stars hotels we stayed in and my wife and I agree with him. We were really imprest with how the house and the rooms are well maintained. Breakfast was excellent and most of all came with special personal care that Rita provided. The location couldn't be better where all attractions are within walking distance. I am highly recommending this wonderful establishment that beats any 5 stars hotel in my opinion. Somehow my son got me to promise him to bring him back to Amsterdam and to Ms. Rita' house next year. I really want to thank Rita for being a great host and looking forward to our next visit. We love her cat, Koos

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Regards,
reviews.title: “Deserves all the praise it gets”

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in this wonderful B & B for our 4th Wedding Anniversary. The B & B is located in a very convenient spot a couple of minutes walk from the tram stop, which is 7 or 8 minutes from the centre of Amsterdam. It is on a side street close to Vondel Park (despite its name it does not have views of the park). It is very quiet.
reviews.title: Superb BnB in great location

reviews.text: Rita is an incredibly accommodating host! The rooms are impeccable, clean, spacious and comfortable. It is a short walk to Vondel Park and the city centre.
reviews.title: What a Fantastic B&B!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have stayed here twice and both times with kids and you feel right at home. The breakfast each morning is delicious and varied and you really feel like you sample the local produce.
reviews.title: Beautifully decorated room and lovely breakfast

reviews.text: We stayed at the beautifully decorated Flower Room, that comes with a beautifully decorated bathroom as well. Heating worked very well and wifi is available.
reviews.title: Perfect stay at Vondel View B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: To note: the room is only accessible by very steep stairs.
reviews.title: Just what we wanted

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast was delicious - the owner added a typical Dutch touch every day.
reviews.title: 2 days is NOT enough.......

description: B&B Suite Vondel View in Amsterdam: unique in style and comfort and ideally situated in a quiet residential street next to the Vondel Park. Your complete private suite with living room, bedroom and bathroom.
